solution_line_template: In a week, a student writes {sessions_per_week}*{pages_per_session}=<<{sessions_per_week}*{pages_per_session}={pages_per_week}>>{pages_per_week} pages.
So in {num_weeks} weeks, each student will write {pages_per_week}*{num_weeks}=<<{pages_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages.
